body_html: I am actually using [embedding_rnn_decoder] (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/contrib/legacy_seq2seq/python/ops/seq2seq.py#L233) (sorry if that caused confusion) so I don't see where num_symbols is passed into the cell? The line you mentioned is in the embedding_rnn_seq2seq, but the functionality is not replicated in the embedding_rnn_decoder. I think that if the code snippet you mentioned was added before cell was passed then the issue I am seeing would be solved?
